en.bdb: Four daughters were given to the sage Kashyap, and many of the daughters married the god Chandrama (moon).

transliteration.english: jab hee jaat bhayo teh thalai ||
transliteration.hindi: जब ही जात भयो तिह थलै ॥
transliteration.en: jab hee jaat bhayo teh thalai ||
transliteration.hi: जब ही जात भयो तिह थलै ॥
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒəb hi d͡ʒɑt̪ ɓəjɔ t̪ɪh t̪ʰəlæ.
transliteration.ur: جب هیِ جات بھےو ته تھلَے ۔۔
